articles.content: An enormous iceberg the size of Chicago recently split away from the George VI Ice Shelf. In the midst of that dramatic break, a research team in Antarctica witnessed a surprising encounter with an e… [+5599 chars]

articles.author: Mike Wall
articles.title: SpaceX Falcon 9 rocket launches 28 Starlink satellites to orbit on record-breaking 28th flight (video) - Space
articles.description: The previous record lasted just a month.
articles.content:
SpaceX has broken its rocket-reuse record yet again.
A Falcon 9 rocket topped with 28 of the company's Starlink internet satellites launched from NASA’s Kennedy Space Center in Florida Tuesday (May … [+1758 chars]
